description: Looking to buy a panda auto car? This is the best opportunity. Done only 4500km. In show room condition. Even the polythene covers of the seats are available. Serviced at Micro company. One free service and 1 1/2 years warranty period remaining. Company price 2345000/=. This one is selling for Rs.2100000/= . Price is negotiable.
name: Micro Panda  2017
